summary: A remesh/retexture of the Daedric Cuirass
descriptionHtml:
Revealing Daedric Cuirass - male v1.0

A remesh/retexture of the Daedric Cuirass

Install:
copy Meshes folder and textures folder into your data directory.

Uses Nude Males by thegal - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1947

Credits:
thegal for the nude male mesh/texture used as a base
MysticBinary82 for hairy texture
Nexus forums
Nifskope forums
Bethesda Softworks
author: Sundracon
